name: Euphoria Cookies
description: Euphoria Cookies is a balanced 50/50 hybrid cross of the ever-popular Girl Scout Cookies and the uplifting sativa Euphoria. The colorful buds exhibit sweet, doughy terpenes that smell like vanilla, rose, and tropical fruit. Euphoria Cookies’ uplifting mental state and soothing body effects make it a perfect fit for consumers looking to improve mood while stimulating appetite, curbing depression, and nullifying minor aches and pains.
descriptionPlain: Euphoria Cookies is a balanced 50/50 hybrid cross of the ever-popular Girl Scout Cookies and the uplifting sativa Euphoria. The colorful buds exhibit sweet, doughy terpenes that smell like vanilla, rose, and tropical fruit. Euphoria Cookies’ uplifting mental state and soothing body effects make it a perfect fit for consumers looking to improve mood while stimulating appetite, curbing depression, and nullifying minor aches and pains.

highlightedReviews.text: The CraftCannabis product of his Strain from Las Vegas, NV is very delectable! It definitely has qualities of the GirlScoutCookies or GSC and definitely the uplifting sativa high you get from the Euphoria. Taste and smell is lucrative and enchanting almost like Christmas! The Apothecary Shoppe is where it's at!
Great bud! Exceptionally smooth and a sweet taste. The ride isn’t overbearing it gets you at a productive level and you’re coasting from there.
